roleset.name: natural disaster: globe-wide epidemic

example.name: pandemic-n: arg2
example.text: If we can limit the pandemic in birds, then down the road we might be able to say H5N1 is gone.

example.name: pandemic-n: arg1
example.text: Two American Red Cross nurses demonstrated treatment practices during the influenza pandemic of 1918.

roleset.note: PANDEMIC-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to epidemic, outbreak. (from pandemic.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.
